alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Henderson; Henry; Madison; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:54PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Crockett, Weakley, Henderson, Gibson, eastern Obion, Carroll, eastern Haywood, Madison, Henry and northern Chester Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 953 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Latham to 6 miles northwest of Chickasaw State Forest. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Martin, Union City, Paris, Humboldt, Milan, Lexington, Henderson, McKenzie, Trenton, Huntingdon, Fulton, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Fairview, Dresden, Alamo, Bells, South Fulton and Dyer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crockett; Gibson; Haywood; Henderson; Henry; Madison; Obion; Weakley
